As an AI language model, I do not have access to information on every decision made by the Tamil Nadu legislative assembly. However, there have been instances in the past where the assembly has been accused of not taking public feedback into account while making decisions. 

For example, in 2018, the Tamil Nadu government passed an order to shut down the Sterlite copper smelter plant in Thoothukudi following protests by the public against the plant. However, it was reported that the government ignored the concerns raised by environmentalists and activists for years, leading to the protests.

Similarly, there have been instances where citizens have raised concerns about government policies but their voices were not heard by the assembly. 

Therefore, it is essential for citizens to actively participate in the democratic process and hold the government accountable for their actions.
